item.title: Jan add a quote by Charles W. Eliot
item.description: "Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers." -- Charles W. Eliot

item.title: Jan add a quote by John Ferriar
Jan add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jan add a quote by Andy Rooney
item.description: "The average dog is a nicer person than the average person." -- Andy Rooney

item.title: Jan add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "You must not ever stop being whimsical. And you must not, ever, give anyone else the responsibility for your life." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Jan add a quote by Joseph Murphy
item.description: "All of us have our own inner fears, beliefs, opinions. These inner assumptions rule and govern our lives. A suggestion has no power in and of itself. its power arises from the fact that you accept it mentally." -- Joseph Murphy

item.title: Jan add a quote by Joseph Murphy
item.description: "Your desire is your prayer. Picture the fulfillment of your desire now and feel its reality and you will experience the joy of the answered. Dr. Joseph Murphy" -- Joseph Murphy
